reviewText: Seller did exactly as promised. Product as described. Very happy. Would buy again.

Great video on windsurfing. It has all the greats doing amazing stuff at locations all around the world. The movie is fairly short (about 20 minutes) but there is an advanced instructional video on the disk that is about 30 minutes with a lot of good tips and techniques.
I have watched almost every windsurf movie in the last 8 years and this one captures the real feel of what the sport is all about, plus features the best of the bestdoing amazing moves- awesome!
